attributes.action: A suitable checking process for stolen caravans by authorities
attributes.additional_details: See national statistics for stolen touring caravans vurses recovery.
attributes.background: The increase in stolen touring caravans is increasing year on year with little or no measures to follow up or a process to check caravans with the CRIS numbers at caravan parks or registered traveller sites. This should become law when booking into any caravan storage, campsite or bulk movement.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
